/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a canopy of shade and a touch of nature amidst the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun casts its warm glow on the scene, illuminating the buildings and creating a play of light and shadow.
